participant_1.name: Mary
participant_1.personality: Outdoorsy and free-spirited, enjoys nature and has a quirky sense of humor.
participant_1.background: I don't mind the hot weather, but it's hard to keep my hair from frizzing. I'm most afraid of people finding out about my weird habit of smelling my own farts. I have been struggling to find a way to explain my vegetarian diet to my girlfriend. I watched my niece swim last year and thought she looked so free. my name is mary and i am from colorado.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Creative and driven, balances a day job with artistic passions, enjoys playful banter.
participant_2.background: I like to spend rainy days in my studio, practicing my dance moves. I am proud of being able to make my passion for music a reality, even though I have a day job. I'm a software engineer, but my passion is writing. i have a cat named seven of nine. my brother thinks he s a viking.

content.text: I am doing well. I am enjoying some rain. How about you?
I am doing well also! I am watching my niece swim. She is so free.
That sounds lovely. I love swimming. I used to be a competitive swimmer.
That is so cool! I wish I knew how to swim.
It is never too late to learn. You should sign up for a class.
I might do that. Thanks for the suggestion.
You're welcome. What are some of your hobbies?
I like to go hiking and camping. I also like to read and write.
Those are all great hobbies. I love to read and write as well. I also like to dance.
Me too! I used to dance when I was younger.
It's never too late to start again.
That would be great! I would love to see you dance sometime.
